articles.title: Aarogya Setu now lets you delete your account, wipe app data - Hindustan Times
articles.description: If you delete your account on Aarogya Setu, your data will remain on the government server for 30 days from the day you delete it.
articles.content: Aarogya Setu, the Covid-19 tracker made by the Indian government, has finally given users the option to delete their account from the app and erase all their data. A new update has also brought in an… [+2271 chars]
